app.name: UniChoice
app.tagline: Maqaaxiinkal jaamacadde Ethiopia afah tan gexxa, qiimeh tan gexxa

landing.hero_title: Ethiopia kee mana barumsah kaxxam kee garsi
landing.hero_subtitle: Jaamacaddah saxdah garsi maahih adagih. Kankalih kedoh kah baaxuuh jaamacaddoh iyo yusekkaalah akkaan salphaah gexxi.
landing.why_choose_subtitle: Wohibih barumsih ayxeeneeh filannoh guutuuh gexxi anuk xamalih ayxeeneeh
landing.feature_comprehensive_search_desc: Jaamacaddoh bakkah, barnaamijtotah, kharashotah, madaallih iyo kana duraan baaxoh. Talooyinkih ayxeeneeh kor ugu ahih filannoh ayxeeneeh addaan qooduuf ni gargaarah.
landing.feature_comparison_desc: Jaamacaddoh kak 3 kedoh adda addah yusebbera. Kharashotah, barnaamijtotah, madaallih iyo ijaarsih wajjin wal qabatanih haalah tokko keessatti madaali.
landing.feature_reviews_desc: Gari barattootah ammah jiranih hubbah manah dhugah kak ta'eh dubbisi. Odeeffannoh dhugah haalah kampaasah, barnootih iyo bu'ah hojjih irratti baaxoh.
landing.testimonials_subtitle: Odeeffannoh dhugah barattootah walitti madaallatamoh baaxoh
landing.testimonial_1: {{appName}} jaamacaddoh akkaan salphaatti walitti madaaluh na gargaarah. Barnootah baayyeeh iyo qabeenyih kana walitti madaaluh naaf eegamah. Gari barattootah ammah jiranh hundah gosaan na gargaarah!
landing.testimonial_2: Akka baratah ogumsah jalqabah, eessatti jalqabuu hin beekuh tureh. {{appName}} odeeffannoh hundih na baaxoh hundih bakkah tokko keessatti na kennah. Qabiyyeeh walitti madaallih filannoh kih gidduu gidduuh akkaan ilaaluh na tursiiseh.
landing.testimonial_3: Jaamacaddoh baaxuuh iyo filachuuh akkaan salphaah ta'uuh na jaallatah. Gargaarsih afaan baay'eeh kanan jechuuh maatiih kih gochaan na tursiiseh. Galatah {{appName}}!
landing.cta_title: Mana Barumsah Kih Guutuuh Baaxoh Qopha'ah?
landing.cta_description: Kumaatamaan barattootah mana barumsah fedhih isaanih {{appName}} wajjin baaxoh hingahuuh.
landing.intro_description: UniChoice Ethiopia kee jaamacaddo gexxaa kee baaxoxik. Macluumaad kah gexxi, barattootak gari gexxi, barnaamijitteeh yusebbera, qadaadi kee cangalih anuk xamala gexxi.
landing.feature_search_desc: Kamakalih xaamusa gaabik Ethiopia kee jaamacaddo magaalo, barnaamijitteeh yamal kedoh baaxoh alih
landing.feature_reviews_desc: Barattootak gari afah tan gexxi, kankalih kaxxam gexxi
landing.feature_favorites_desc: Jaamacaddo kankalih kedoh yammiyy kee hubbakalih gexxi
landing.future_starts_p1: {{appName}} waa platformkih la aamini karo ee ku xidha ardaytotah machadkih waxbarashah ee ugu fiican Ethiopia dhammaantiis. Waxaan waddaynah sidah ardaytotah ay ugaaraan, isbarbar dhigaana ka gaaraan go'aansooyin toos ah ka gaaraan safarkih waxbarashih.
landing.future_starts_p2: Iyadoo la wadaagayo macluumaad dheerah oo ka kooban ilaa 50+ jaamacadoh, macluumaad dheerah oo barnaamijyadah, faallooyin ardaytotah oo run ah iyo qalab isbarbar dhiga, waxaan ku siinaynah awood inaad heshid machadkih uu ku haboon yahay ujeeddooyinkih ayxeeneeh, miisahih ayxeeneeh iyo ra'yigih ayxeeneeh.
landing.learn_more_button: Wax Badan Oo Anaga Ku Saabsan Ogaasho
landing.expert_guidance_desc: Hel khayraadkih, hagih iyo talooyin khabiirka ah si aad ugaasho habkih codsigih iyo inaad go'aansooyin toos ah ka gaarto.
landing.up_to_date_desc: Databasekih ayxeeneeh waa la cusbooneeyeyaa si joogto ah oo ku jira kharashih ugu dambeeyay, soo bixintah barnaamijyadah, shuruudih helitaankih iyo muddooyinkih.
landing.multilingual_desc: Hel platformkih ayxeeneeh lix luuqadoh: Ingiriisigah, Afkih Amxaarigah, Tigrinya, Afaan Oromo, Soomaaligah iyo Afkih Afaarigah.

universities.title: Jaamacaddo dukua
universities.hero_subtitle: Qanxisaah baxah kinnat Itoobiyak keenih barattoonih nuktaaxak raqta.
universities.no_results_desc: Afal kale raadisa yanih kah gexxaa jaamacaddo dukua
universities.cta_title: Nakalih kah xamala gexxi caawimay raqta?
universities.cta_desc: Nayruh yusebberih qalabak raadisina si xamalak keenih jaamacaddo xamala keenih kee kah xamala gexxi nakalih.

university_card.max_compare_alert: Yusebberih jaamacaddo 3 baxah wakti qimme kataysaana.

university_edit.title: Profil jaamacad caagat
university_edit.subtitle: Macluumaad kah gexxaa jaamacad kankalih xamala gexxi

compare.title: Jaamacaddo yusebbera
compare.subtitle: Yusebberih xamalak kee kah xamala gexxi kee nakalih.

auth.name: Magac kah gexxaa
auth.signup_subtitle: Ku biir {{appName}} oo bilaw safarkihih waxbarashihih
auth.error_occurred: Qalad ayxeeneeh. Mar kale isku day.

footer.tagline: Kankalih gexxa kee jaamacaddo kah gexxi Ethiopia kee kah baaxoh alih.

about.hero_subtitle: Barattootak machadkihih waxbarashihih kah gexxih kedoh baaxoh
about.story_p1: {{appName}} ka ujeeddo salphaan ka'ee: machadkih waxbarashih saxihih kah gexxih ardaytotah Ethiopia kih alih kedoh baaxoh alih. Doorkihih doorashahih machadkih waxbarashih kih wal dhabiyih, yero kee dhabiyih, oo badanaa waa adag.
about.story_p2: Platformih ayxeeneeh wuxuu isugu keenayaa macluumaad dheerah oo ku saabsan jaamacadah, koollejih iyo dugsiih wadankih dhammaantiis, oo ardaytotah u siinaya qalabhah ay u baahan yihiin inay go'aansooyin toos ah ka gaaraan. Waxaan aaminsanahay in waxbarashadu ay tahay saldhiggih horumarkih shakhsi iyo wadankih, waxaana ka wadaa inay macluumaadkih waxbarashah tayadah leh ay u noqdaan mid u furan qof kasta oo.
about.story_p3: Mashaariic yar oo hore u bilowday ayaa hadda noqday platform dheerah oo ardaytotah kunno Ethiopia u adeegaya. Databasekih ayxeeneeh waan ballaarisanah, qalabhih ayxeeneeh waan hagaajinaynah, waxaana ka dhageynaynah arrimah ka soo jeeda ardaytotah, waalidih iyo macallimiinta.
about.mission_text: In ardaytotah la siiyo macluumaad ifaysan, dheerah oo aaminsan oo ku saabsan machadkih waxbarashah, iyagoo u suurto gelineysa inay helaan machadkih ku haboon ujeeddooyinkooda waxbarasho, awooddooda maaliyadeed iyo ra'yigooda shaqo.
about.vision_text: Inaan noqonno platformkih helitaankih waxbarashah ugu aaminsan oo dheerah ee Ethiopia, oo ku xidhaan milyannooyin arday ah jidkooda waxbarasho ee ugu fiican, waxaana ka gudbaya horumarkih waxbarashah wadankih.
about.values_subtitle: Mabda'ah oo dhammo waxaan barnaannaynah uu na gudbiyaa
about.value_transparency_desc: Waxaan aaminsanahay inaynu siinayno macluumaad run ah, sax ah oo casri ah si loo caawiyo ardaytotah inay go'aansooyin toos ah ka gaaraan.
about.value_accessibility_desc: Waxbarashadu waa inay u furan tahay qof kasta oo aan waxba ka eegnayn asalkah, meeshah yama xaaladah maaliyadeed.
about.value_innovation_desc: Waxaan sii wadaynah inaynu hagaajinno platformkih ayxeeneeh oo noo bixinoo timo iyo qalab cusub si aad u adeegsiino kooxdah ardaytotah.
about.offer_subtitle: Qalab dheerah iyo khayraad si aad u taageerto safarkih waxbarashah
about.offer_item_1: Database dheerah oo ka kooban jaamacadoh 50+ iyo machadkih
about.offer_item_2: Macluumaad dheerah oo barnaamijih ku saabsan baaritaankih helitaankih
about.offer_item_3: Faallooyin iyo qiimeeyntah ardaytotah ah oo run ah
about.offer_item_6: Macluumaadkih lacagotah iyo taageerah maaliyadeed ee waqtigan xaadirka ah
about.offer_item_9: Khayraadkih bixintah waxbarashah iyo taageerah maaliyadeed
about.impact_p1: Laga soo bilaabo bilaabiddah {{appName}}, waxaay caawisay kunnooyin arday ah oo ku dhex maray safarkooda waxbarashah. Waxaan u faraxsannahay inaan ka mid nahay qayb ka mid ah liiskih guushah, waxaana sii wadaynah ballaarintih heerkeena.
about.cta_subtitle: Maanta bilaab safarkih waxbarashih oo hel jaamacaddih ugu wanaagsan ee adiga ku haboon.
about.learn_more: Wax Badan Oo Anaga Ku Saabsan Ogaasho

help.hero_subtitle: Hel jawaabih su'aalah caadiga ah oo baro sidaah ugu sii fududeyso adeegsiga {{appName}}.
help.quick_link_contact_desc: Caawimo dheeraad ah u baahan tahay?
help.faq_search_a: Isticmaal baaritaankih bogih hore yama bogih jaamacadotah. Waxaad u raadi kartaa magacah jaamacaddah, magaaladah, barnaamijkih yama erey muhiimka ah. Filiddah aanu leenahay ayaa ku caawinaysa inaad ku dhakhsatoh natiijooyinkih iyadoo loo eegayo heerkih kharashkih, qiimah, yama noocah barnaamijkih.
help.faq_compare_a: Haa! Guji badhankah 'Ku dar Isbarbar dhiga' kaardiih jaamacaddah yama bogih profile ah. Waxaad isbarbar dhigi kartaa ilaa 3 jaamacadoh isku meel ah si aad u qiimeyso kharashkih, barnaamijyadah, qiimeeyntah, qalabhih iyo astaamoh kale oo muhiim ah. Booqo bogih isbarbar dhiga si aad u aragto dhammaan jaamacadotah aad dooratay ee hal goobtah.
help.faq_favorites_q: Sidee uu u keydinaa jaamacadotah jeclka ah?
help.faq_favorites_a: Guji aragtidih wadnaha kaardiih jaamacaddah kasta. Ku jeclka ah ayaa ku keydinayah browserkih ayxeeneeh marka hore waxaana laga heli karaa qaybtah 'Jeclka' ee menu barbaarintah. Waxaad isticmaali kartaa yama ka saari kartaa jeclka ah waqtigah kasta.
help.faq_reviews_a: Haa, waxaan xaqijinaynah faallooyinkih ardaytotah si loo hubiyo runtah. Faallooyinkih calaamaddih xaqijintah leh ayaa ka soo jeeda ardaytotah hadda jira yama kuwah machadkih waxbarashah ka soo baxay. Waxaan dhiirrigelinaynah faallooyin run ah, waxaana ilaalinaynah faallooyinkih si aan u ilaashno tayadah.
help.faq_updates_q: Intee le'eg ayaa macluumaadkih loo cusbooneeyeyaa?
help.faq_updates_a: Waxaan si joogto ah u cusbooneeyeynah databasekih ayxeeneeh, inta badan bilowgih sanad kasta oo waxbarasho ah iyo marka jaamacaduhu macluumaad cusub ay bixiyaan. Si kastaba ha ahaatee, waxaan kula talineynah inaad xaqiijiso macluumaadkih muhiimka ah sidaah kharashkih, shuruudahih helitaankih iyo muddooyinkih tooskih ah ee machadkih waxbarashah si aad u hesho tafatiirkaah ugu dambeeya.
help.faq_free_a: Haa! {{appName}} ardaytotah waa bilaash dhammaantood. Dhammaan astaamah oo ay ku jiraan raadintah, isbarbar dhiga, faallooyinkih iyo khayraadkih waxaa laga heli karaa lacag la'aan. Waxaan ka wadaa inaan macluumaadkih waxbarashah ay u noqdaan mid heli kara qof kasta oo.
help.faq_write_review_a: U tag bogih profile ee jaamacaddah oo guji taabkah 'Faallooyinkih'. Waxaad ka heli doontaa foomkah hoose ee aad wadaagi kartaa khibradih ayxeeneeh. Faalladih ayxeeneeh waxay caawiyeysah ardaytotah kale inay go'aansooyin toos ah ka gaaraan!
help.faq_languages_a: {{appName}} wuxuu ku heli karaa lix luuqadoh: Ingiriisigah, Afkih Amxaarigah, Tigrinya, Afaan Oromo, Soomaaligah iyo Afkih Afaarigah. Isticmaal beddelahih luuqaddih madaxah si aad u bedeshaad luuqaddih aad dooratay.
help.faq_request_q: Ma codsataa in la daro jaamacad?
help.faq_request_a: Hagaag! Databasekih ayxeeneeh ayaan had iyo jeer sii ballaarisaynah. Nala soo xidhiidh bogih Xidhiidhkih yama noo email garee info@unichoice.et iyadoo la wadaagayo macluumaadkih jaamacaddah, waxaana ka shaqaynah si aan ugu darno platformkih ayxeeneeh.
help.faq_tuition_q: Intee le'eg ayay u saxan tahay macluumaadkih kharashkih?
help.faq_tuition_a: Waxaan dadaalaynah inaynu siino macluumaadkih kharashkih oo sax ah, laakiin kharashyadu way kala duwanaan kartaa iyadoo loo eegayo barnaamijkih, heerkih shahaadadih iyo sanadkih. Had iyo jeer xaqiijiso kharashkih saxda ah oo kujirtah xafiiskih helitaankih ee jaamacaddah ka hor intaadan go'aansooyin maaliyadeed ka gaartid.
help.still_need_help_desc: Ma waxba ma helin waxaad raadinaysay? Kooxdih ayxeeneeh taageerah ayaa halkaan u joogta inay kaa caawiyaan su'aal yama cabsi kasta.

contact.hero_subtitle: Su'aal leedahay? Halkaan joognaah inaan kaa caawinno. Nala soo xidhiidh kooxdih ayxeeneeh, waxaana ku soo celin doonaah sidah ugu dhakhsahah badankih.
contact.email_response: Waxaan ku soo celinaynah 24 saacadoh gudahood
contact.address_visit: Booqo xafiiskih ayxeeneeh marka ay socdaan saacadah shaqah
contact.form_subject_placeholder: Tan waxay ku saabsan tahay maxay?
contact.form_message_placeholder: Nagu sheeg sidee aannu kaa caawin karno...
contact.form_success: Waad ku mahadsantahay farriintih ayxeeneeh! Waxaan ku soo celin doonaah dhaqso.
contact.faq_quick_q: Intee le'eg ayay dhakhso u soo celinayah?
contact.faq_quick_a: Inta badan waxaan ku soo celinaynah 24 saacadoh gudahood maalintah shaqah.
contact.faq_universities_q: Ma jaamacaduhu inay nala soo xidhiidhaan karaa?
contact.faq_universities_a: Haa! Jaamacaduhu waxay naga soo xidhiidhi karaah in lagu daro yama macluumaadkoodah loo cusbooneeyo.
contact.faq_counseling_a: Marka aanu khayraadkih bixino, waxaan ku talineynah inaad la xiriirto macallimiintah dugsigah si aad u hesho talo gaar ah.

resources.hero_subtitle: Hel hagih dheerah, talooyin iyo khayraadkih si aad ugaasho safarkih waxbarashah.
resources.admissions_desc: Hagih dheerah ee helitaankih jaamacadotah Ethiopia, oo ay ku jiraan shuruudih, muddooyinkih iyo talooyin ujeedadah guushah.
resources.scholarships_desc: Hel bixintah waxbarashah heli kara, deeqah iyo barnaamijyadah taageerah maaliyadeed ee taageerayh waxbarashadih ayxeeneeh.
resources.blog_desc: Akhriso sheekooyin, talooyin iyo tixraacyo ka soo jeeda ardaytotah hadda jira iyo kuwah machadkih waxbarashah ka soo baxay.

profile.university_setup_subtitle: Hagaaji accountkih ayxeeneeh jaamacaddah macluumaad dheerah
profile.university_setup_desc: Ku dar profilekih ayxeeneeh jaamacaddah, meelahih jaamacaddah, barnaamijyadah iyo macluumaad kale oo muhiim ah si ardaytotah ay u helaan machadkih ayxeeneeh.
profile.profile_view_desc: Kani waa sidah ardaytotah ay u arkaan profilekih ayxeeneeh jaamacaddah
profile.no_favorites_yet: Wali iyo hadda jecel ma jiraan
profile.start_exploring: Jaamacadaha baadi oo jecel kuu dar!
profile.no_reviews_yet: Wali iyo hadda kankali ma jiraan
profile.delete_account_warning: Markaad akoonkaaga tirtirto, dib u celin ma noqon karto. Fadlan hubso.
profile.delete_account_confirm: Ma hubtaa inaad akoonkaaga tirtirido? Ficilkaani ma dib u celin karo.
